applicationIssues.response: If the application is loading slowly, try clearing your browser cache and cookies. This often resolves performance issues.
For login issues, ensure Caps Lock is off and your password is entered correctly. If you need to reset your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link.
If you're seeing a blank screen, try refreshing the page (F5) or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, try using a different browser.
Connection timeout errors often indicate network issues. Check your internet connection and try again. If the problem continues, contact your network administrator.
If file uploads are failing, ensure your file is under the size limit (max 10MB) and in an accepted format (PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG).
For browser compatibility issues, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge. Internet Explorer is not supported.
If forms aren't submitting, check for required fields marked with an asterisk (*) and ensure all data is in the correct format.
Session timeout issues can be resolved by logging out completely and logging back in. For security, sessions expire after 30 minutes of inactivity.
If reports aren't generating, try clearing your browser cache or downloading in a different format (PDF, CSV, or Excel).
For printing issues, ensure your printer is connected and try using the 'Print Preview' option first. PDF format often works best for printing.
If images aren't loading, check your internet connection and try refreshing the page. You can also try clearing your browser's image cache.
Calendar sync issues can often be resolved by removing and re-adding your calendar integration in the Settings menu.
If you're experiencing data display issues, try switching between list and grid views, or adjusting your display settings in your profile.
For mobile app issues, ensure you have the latest version installed from your app store and try force-closing and reopening the app.
If you're seeing error messages, take a screenshot of the error and note what you were doing when it occurred. This helps our support team assist you better.
